de.weltraumschaf.dht

Class Clock

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.dht.Clock

  • public final class Clock
extends Object
    Counts seconds from starting point. Provides time thread safe. start() must be called very first. Before the clack can be used.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  Clock.SystemTimeSource
      Uses System.nanoTime() as source.
      static interface  Clock.TimeSource
      Provides time in nanoseconds.

      Default source.

      Error message if not started.

      Time source provider.
      private boolean started
      Whether the clock was started or not.
      private long startTime
      Start time.

      Creates clock with a default time source.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long elapsed()
      Returns the elapsed time since start() was called first.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public Clock start()
        Starts the clock. Subsequent calls has no effect. Must be called first before using now() or elapsed().
        Returns:
        self for chaining

      • now

        public long now()
        Returns the current time.
        Returns:
        current time in nanoseconds

      • elapsed

        public long elapsed()
        Returns the elapsed time since start() was called first.
        Returns:
        elapsed time in nanoseconds
